title: Ms. Taken
description: Previously unreleased, Ms. Taken was shelved after a nation-wide conversation about gun violence. This is the lost footage of a troubled production.
quote: You picked the wrong shopaholic to mess with.
altHero: Ms. Taken in a black leather jumpsuit points a gun
alt1: Ms. Taken (with her gun) approaches a rabbit in a trenchcoat in a mall department store
alt2: Ms. Taken talks to a tattooed dog near some candy dispensers
alt3: the tattooed dog pulls a knife
alt4: Ms. Taken pulls out two guns
